Articles.Content: This has been a thought I have had for some time now. Would it be possible with the existing forum software to create a dedicated mobile app for the forum? I know I use this as like my only social network. Plus possibly it would let mobile notifications work better. I'm thinking of trying to write an Android app which just fetches data from the existing forum structure. Thoughts?
I'm 90% sure that tapatalk already works with this forum engine, I believe it just needs some implementation from the devs here.
Moved thread to Kerbal Network, as it's about the forum itself and not the game.
Sorry I thought I had posted it in the Kerbal network. My bad! thanks
